ðŸ¤¨: "Do your sisters even have friends outside their households?"

To clarify, since it may sound misleading in English. Koishi is not quite saying "**My** sister's friend" here, but "**My sister's friend**" as a whole. She's not referring to Satori or Remilia specifically, but "sister" (specifically older sister) in general as the fetish's description.
